member.name: IShellImageStore.Close
member.param: A pointer to a variable of type DWORD that specifies the address that receives the lock during the call to the method.
member.returns: Returns S_FALSE if the store is not open or if the store cannot be saved. Returns the result of otherwise.

member.name: IShellImageStore.Commit
member.summary: Writes the contents specified by pdwLoc to storage.
member.param: A pointer to a variable of type DWORD that specifies the address that receives the lock.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value, including the following:

listheader.description: Saving was unsuccessful. The storage is not open or is open without write access.

member.name: IShellImageStore.IsEntryInStore
member.summary: Checks to see if the image is in the store.
member.param: A pointer to a null-terminated string that specifies the path to the file that contains the image.
A pointer to a structure that specifies the time stamp for the image.

returns.para: Returns one of the following values.

listheader.description: The entry is in the store.
The entry is not in the store.

member.name: IShellImageStore
member.summary: Deprecated. Exposes methods that manipulate the image cache.
